hero.subtitle: EMPOWERING OPTICIANS TO DETECT EYE ISSUES FASTER

welcome.title: Welcome to Auge.cloud Website
welcome.text: We are thrilled to have you on our platform, designed specifically for Doctors and Opticians. Here, you can upload images of your patients' eyes for advanced analysis. Our system will provide you with a detailed report, including potential diagnoses and the likelihood of various conditions. Our mission is to empower you with the tools you need to deliver exceptional care to your patients. Thank you for trusting us with your practice!

about.title: About Us
about.section_paragraph: where cutting-edge technology meets healthcare innovation. Our mission is to revolutionize eye care through advanced imaging and analysis. We understand the vital role that vision plays in your life, and we are dedicated to ensuring that everyone has access to comprehensive eye health assessments. At Auge.cloud Website, we utilize state-of-the-art imaging techniques to capture detailed pictures of the eye. Our sophisticated algorithms analyze these images to detect potential eye diseases at their earliest stages, allowing for timely intervention and treatment. Whether it's glaucoma, diabetic retinopathy, or other eye conditions, our goal is to empower individuals with the knowledge they need to maintain their eye health.

career.title: Career
career.paragraph_1: We are always looking for passionate professionals to join our mission of revolutionizing early eye disease detection.
career.paragraph_2: If you are an experienced developer, data scientist, medical professional, or optician looking to make a difference with technology — we'd love to hear from you.

advertise.title: Advertise
advertise.paragraph_1: Interested in advertising with us? We offer targeted advertising opportunities for:

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.intro_1: We at auge.cloud ('we', 'our', 'us') are committed to protecting and respecting your privacy in accordance with the European Union General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), the German Federal Data Protection Act (BDSG), and all applicable laws and professional confidentiality obligations in Germany related to medical data.
privacy.intro_2: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and share your personal data, particularly sensitive health information, when you visit our website https://auge.cloud, use our services, or otherwise interact with us.
privacy.section_1_text: The data controller for the processing of your personal data is: auge.cloud, Email: support@augenarzt.cloud
privacy.section_2_text: We may process the following categories of personal data:
section_2_health_list: Medical images (e.g., retinal scans, diagnostic images)
Medical history (if submitted by user or physician)
Uploaded documents or files containing health data
privacy.section_2_note: This includes data voluntarily submitted by opticians, doctors, or patients, or data we generate through our diagnostic platform.
privacy.section_5_text: We do not share your data unless:
section_5_list: Needed for secure data storage under GDPR-compliant terms
section_6_list: Health data stored for up to 10 years
Data deleted upon request (Art. 17 GDPR), unless legally required
privacy.section_8_complaint: Right to lodge a complaint: https://www.bfdi.bund.de
privacy.section_9_text: Essential cookies only; analytics cookies used with consent. Preferences manageable via browser or banner.
privacy.section_10_text: No data is transferred outside the EEA unless under EU safeguards.
privacy.section_11_text: AI suggestions do not replace professional medical judgment.
privacy.section_12_text: Not intended for users under 16 without parental consent.
privacy.section_13_text: We may update this notice. Latest version is available at https://auge.cloud.

terms.title: Terms
terms.intro: Welcome to <0>auge.cloud</0> ('we', 'our', 'us'). By accessing or using our website <1>https://auge.cloud</1>, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you must not use our services.
terms.section_1_text: All services are currently offered free of charge.
terms.section_2_title: 2. No Medical Treatment or Paid Services
terms.section_2_text: We do not provide direct treatment or commercial services. The platform supports—but does not replace—medical expertise.
section_3_list: Only qualified opticians and doctors may use the platform
Users must upload lawful, accurate, and relevant medical data
terms.section_4_text: We comply with GDPR and BDSG. Users must ensure patient consent is obtained before uploading data. See our <0>Privacy Policy</0> for full details.
terms.section_5_text: All content belongs to <0>auge.cloud</0> unless otherwise noted. Users may not copy, alter, or redistribute any part without written permission.
section_6_list: Clinical decisions based on platform use
terms.section_6_text: Use is at the user’s own risk.
terms.section_7_text: We reserve the right to update or suspend services at any time. Changes will be announced via <0>https://auge.cloud</0>.
terms.section_8_text: We may suspend users who violate terms or upload harmful/illegal content.
terms.section_9_text: German law applies. Disputes fall under German courts’ jurisdiction.
